Thoughtfully designed for your active Pemberton lifestyle, Elevate duplexes are ideal for growing families or the perfect weekend home with plenty of room to entertain. Designed to meet BC Energy Code Step 4 standards, these new duplexes will use 47% less energy than a conventional minimum code-built home. Conveniently located in the new Sunstone neighbourhood and close to recreational amenities including easy access to a large network of hiking and biking trails right from your door. Not subject to Foreign Buyers’ Tax or Speculation and Vacancy Tax.
Realtor Remarks: Active construction site. Contact Keith McIvor at 604-935-2650 to arrange a site tour.

Public Remarks: Meet Will: A collection of 43 craftsman-style townhomes with renowned Marcon quality construction. Ideally located in the heart of Port Moody, this 4-bedroom, 3.5-bathroom home features custom-designed kitchen cabinetry, premium stainless-steel appliances, solid quartz countertops & a subway tile backsplash. Additional features include A/C, NuHeat heated floors in the ensuite, and a spacious master bedroom that fits a king-size bed! Double attached garage incl two Level-2 EV charging receptacles. Common amenities include an outdoor BBQ area, playground, garden, & firepit. Access to world-class recreation is at your fingertips at Belcarra Park. Charming cafes, restaurants, breweries, and shops are steps away. Grocery stores, schools & a community centre are all within a 5-min drive.
Realtor Remarks: Our presentation center is currently under construction and is anticipated to be open in late July. All materials are currently available digitally. Extra-long garage to store your car & gear with direct access into the suite. Very easy to show by appointment.

Internet Remarks: Welcome to the Cumberland. A Point Grey classic building with gracious and spacious rooms, vaulted ceilings, and cathedral windows. This thoughtfully designed three-bedroom townhomes have efficient open concept layouts, Bosch & Blomberg appliances, and oversized outdoor spaces.
